title: Cardax - DEX on Cardano phase 2,3,4
description: There is currently no decentralized exchange (DEX) on Cardano. Tokens built on Cardano dont have a 'native exchange' to list yet.

f6_assessments.q0: DEX in cardano are needed after alonzo, so this is a important project for the ecosystem addressing perfectly the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: an experienced team with knowledge in plutus, funded in last fund and starting the pre-sell of tokens, they are in the way to success
f6_assessments.q2: they have a detailed plan in the proposal but no kpis or a way to follow the success of their platform. That would be a helpful information to audit the progress

solution: Cardax - The first DEX in the Cardano ecosystem. Cardax will be like Uniswap but on Cardano.
experience: Our tech team has 3 blockchain developers who have finished the Plutus Pioneers program, one front-end developer, one back-end developer.
